selection_reasoning: The strategy for Gen 6 will be to take the best-performing 'shaking + LP' framework from trial_3_4 and apply 'surgical' precision. Analysis shows the 2e-6 gap is a matter of radii optimization precision and search duration. I will focus on micro-jittering and ensuring every center configuration is polished with a high-precision LP solver.

trial_selections.reasoning: All-time best score (2.635983). Its combination of randomized shaking and LP-based radii optimization is the most effective approach discovered so far.
Best of Gen 5. The penalty-based annealing approach is good for finding new basins, but needs the high-precision LP polish from 3_4.
The original successful implementation of the shaking + SLSQP strategy, providing a clean baseline for parameter tuning.
